title: What Are The Best Vegetables To Grow To Save Money?
description: In this video, I share my top 10 money saving vegetables, based on my experience of how easy and productive the vegetables are to grow, and also their comparative cost in the shops.

title: How To Clean Water Butts
description: A complete guide on how to clean water butts, covering why water butts need cleaning, and the techniques and equipment used to clean them.

title: How To Grow Rhubarb
description: A complete guide to growing rhubarb including planting, care, harvesting, and cooking ideas.

title: Soil Nurturing, And What Makes A Healthy Soil
description: An introduction to soil nurturing, the characteristics of a healthy soil, what nutrients plants need to grow, and the principles I follow when nurturing soil on my allotment plot.

title: What To Grow In A Polytunnel
description: An introduction to what to grow in a polytunnel, covering what is a polytunnel, the challenges of growing in a polytunnel, and the variety of plants that can be successfully grown inside.

title: How To Sow Tomato Seed
description: A step by step video on how to sow tomato seed, including when to sow, the equipment needed, planting technique, how to water, and where to position the seed for optimum germination.

title: How To Grow Elephant Garlic From Germination To Harvesting
description: A step by step video on how to grow elephant garlic from planting elephant garlic cloves through to germination and harvesting.

title: Growing Green Manures The Results At The End Of Winter
description: Describing how the five types of green manure sown on the allotment have performed overwinter, and my thoughts on how well the different types have done.

title: How To Grow Leeks - From Sowing Seed To Harvesting.
description: A complete guide on how to grow leeks from seed, including when to sow varieties, transplanting seedlings, care, dealing with rust, and when to harvest.

title: Green Manure December Update Before The First Frosts
description: A December update showing how the September planting of green manure is progressing before the first hard frosts of winter arrive.

title: Green Manure Plants One Month After Sowing Seed
description: Showing the progress after sowing of five types of green manure seed. The video shows the green manures one month after sowing the seed.

title: How To Revive And Repot Aloe Vera Plants
description: Transforming overgrown aloe vera into attractive plants. A step by step guide for anyone with overgrown aloe vera plants or who wants to know more about growing aloe vera.

title: Allotment Tour, September 2022
description: A tour of my allotment in mid-September 2022, covering harvesting winter squash, elephant garlic, courgettes, onions, and potatoes.

title: Allotment Tour, August 2022
description: A tour of my allotment in mid-August 2022. See what's growing and ideas for how to prepare a plot when going away on holiday.

title: Allotment Tour, June 2022
description: A tour of my allotment in mid-June 2022, including the first harvest of gooseberries and cucumbers, a review of what is growing, and recent jobs.

title: Allotment Tour, May 2022
description: A tour of my allotment in mid-May 2022, showing what is growing on the plot, the jobs done, and what I plan to do over the next few weeks.

title: How To Plant Potatoes
description: A step by step guide to planting potatoes on a UK allotment. There are different ways of planting potatoes, but this is what works for me.

title: How To Plant Onion Sets
description: A step by step guide to planting onion sets on a UK allotment.

title: How To Pot On Tomato Plants
description: A step by step video on how to pot on young tomato plants into their final growing pots.

title: Making Coffee At Home
description: Four different methods for making coffee at home to create delicious tasting coffee, including instant, espresso, and continental coffees.

title: Growing Garlic
description: How to grow garlic month by month on a UK allotment, from planting garlic to harvesting, including how to store garlic.

title: Storing Homegrown Potatoes
description: A short video showing how I store my homegrown potatoes.

title: Planting Garlic
description: This video shows how I plant garlic on my allotment, including an overview of garlic varieties, choosing which cloves to sow, planting depth, and use of netting.

title: Tomato Cuttings
description: Taking tomato cuttings is an easy and fast way to get more tomato plants from existing plants.

title: Training Tomato Plants
description: A step by step video on how to train tomato plants, how tomatoes grow naturally, and how to prune tomatoes.

title: DIY Steel Fruit Cage
description: My DIY solution to how to build a walk in fruit cage. It is a durable walk in fruit cage made from galvanised steel and Kee clamps.

title: Controlling Aphids On Fruit Trees
description: This video describes how I control aphids on fruit trees. There are a number of techniques for doing this, but what I show in this video is what works for me.

title: Hot Composting
description: This video is about hot composting and how I use this method to make compost for my garden and allotment.

title: Allotment Ratatouille
description: This recipe is inspired by the classic French dish of stewed vegetables. It tastes delicious, and is a great way of enjoying nutritious British vegetables.

title: Creamy Tomato Soup
description: This recipe creates a rich and creamy tomato soup, bursting with the goodness of tomatoes.

title: Strawberry Coulis Recipe
description: Strawberry coulis creates a stunning mouth watering dessert when drizzled over ice cream. It is very quick to make.

title: Strawberry Mousse Recipe
description: Strawberry mousse is a light and refreshing dessert. It is quick and easy to make, but does need at least an hour in the fridge to chill and thicken.

title: Courgette Omelette Recipe
description: Courgette omelette is a combination of ingredients that works surprisingly well, with the lightness of the courgette complementing the richness of the eggs.

title: Iced Fruit Smoothie
description: How to make an iced fruit smoothie step by step. Ice fruit smoothies taste great and are packed full of vitamins.

title: Red Gooseberry Jam
description: A step by step video recipe on how to make red gooseberry jam.

title: Cucumber Fridge Pickle
description: Cucumber, dill, and garlic pickle is a mouthwatering combination of flavours, a delicious treat ideal for hot summer days.

title: July Allotment Tour 2021
description: A tour of my allotment in mid-July 2021, showing what is growing on the plot, the jobs done, and what I plan to do over the next few weeks.
